column1: #Text=At least fifteen killed after suicide bombing in Somali hotel
#Text=A deadly hotel bombing in Mogadishu , the capital of Somalia , has killed at least fifteen people , including three Somali Cabinet ministers , earlier today .
#Text=Some reports say the death toll could be higher .
#Text=The blast targeted a university graduation ceremony being attended by a number of government officials .
#Text=The Shamo Hotel was hosting a graduation ceremony for Banadir University .
#Text=Eyewitnesses reported that a suicide bomber gained access to the venue dressed as a woman , donning a full abaya and a veil .
#Text=The attacker was wearing an explosive strapped to his torso , but was not patted down by security .
#Text=The director of Median Hospital , Ali Yusuf , commented that " forty people with shrapnel wounds , including students and medical doctors , have been hospitalized today .
